    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Risque de cancer selon la dose de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">Risk of cancer depending on radiation dose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefahr des Krebses abhängig von Strahlung Dosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Risco do cancer dependendo do dose da radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rischio di cancro secondo la dose di radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνδυνος καρκίνου ανάλογα με τη δόση ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Riesgo del cáncer dependiendo de la dosis de la 
radiación</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce graphique par ligne montre le rapport du risque de cancer avec la quantité de rayonnement que votre corps reçoit.</string>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship of the risk of cancer with the amount of radiation your body receives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Corps</string>
            <string language="en">Body</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cancer</string>
            <string language="en">cancer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dose de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">radiation dose</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm stellt dar, daß das 
Verhältnis der Gefahr des Krebses mit der Menge von Strahlung, die 
Ihr Körper empfängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra que o relacionamento 
do risco do cancer com a quantidade de radiação que seu corpo 
recebe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra che il rapporto del
rischio di cancro con la quantità di radiazione il vostro corpo 
riceve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
του κινδύνου καρκίνου με το ποσό ακτινοβολίας το σώμα που σας 
λαμβάνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra que el lazo del 
riesgo del cáncer con la cantidad de radiación que su cuerpo recibe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krebs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Dosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cancer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dose da radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cancro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dose di radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καρκίνος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δόση ακτινοβολίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuerpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cáncer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dosis de la radiación</string>
          </keyword>
